text: Könchek (died 1308) was Khan of the Chagatai Khanate (1307–1308). He was the son of Duwa. Upon his father's death, Könchek became Khan. His reign only lasted a year, before his death in 1308. Category:1308 deaths Category:Chagatai khans Category:14th-century monarchs in Asia Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Könchek
